snippet.title: Sports Pad Football (1987 Sega) | Sega Masters #32
snippet.description:
It's the return of the Sega Sports Pad in this football cartridge which ... is basically Great Football recycled. Only now you're trying to overcome that fourth-quarter deficit with the trakball instead of the gamepad. Why this game even exists is a question few can answer.

#SportsPadFootball #SegaMasterSystem
